title: Los Ojos
subtitle: The Eyes
meta_desc: Learn about eyes in Spanish (ojos, ver, mirar, colores) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish body parts, los ojos Spanish, eyes in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: Los Ojos
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child with big bright curious eyes looking at the viewer.

pages.title: Tengo dos ojos.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A smiling child pointing to their two eyes.

pages.title: Mis ojos pueden ver.

pages.title: Veo los colores.

pages.title: Veo las estrellas.

pages.title: Mis ojos parpadean.
